TrcCommonLib.trclib

Class TrcDiagnostics.Test<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • TrcCommonLib.trclib.TrcDiagnostics.Test<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - specifies the group enum type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TrcTestAnalogSensorValueChange
    Enclosing class:
    TrcDiagnostics<T>

    public abstract static class TrcDiagnostics.Test<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a generic diagnostics test with a specified name and a group the test is associated with. This class is intended to be extended by a more specific diagnostics test that provides the actual method to perform test. A method is provided to run the test and update the test status.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Test

        public Test(java.lang.String name,
            T group,
            TrcUtil.DataSupplier<java.lang.Boolean> conditional,
            boolean defStatus)
        Constructor: Create an instance of the object.
        Parameters:
        name - specifies the name of the test.
        group - specifies the test group the test is associated with.
        conditional - specifies the conditional method that determines whether the test will be run, null if none specified in which case, the test will always run.
        defStatus - specifies the default test status to be returned if the test is not run because conditional was false.

        public java.lang.String getTestError()
        This method returns the test error message. If the test passed, null is returned.
        Returns:
